traits.name: Trample
traits.desc: If the bison moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the bison can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The bighorn bison can make one gore attack and one kick attack.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Stomp
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Kick
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target directly behind it. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.
